corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: The story of the Nez Perce struggle to defend their ancient homeland is one of the most outstanding in American history .
The wilderness retreat of Seven Spirit Bay on the Northern Territory 's Coburg Peninsula is the homeland for Australia 's Aborigines .
Their mountainous homeland with its fortress valleys was a near impregnable base from which to sally forth .
In May 1806 , Lewis and Clark re-entered the Nez Perce homeland , on their journey back from the Pacific .
After all , nothing could be worse than the war-torn , economically deprived , famine stricken homelands which they left behind .
Numbering less than 6000 souls , the Nez Perce roamed a traditional Plateau homeland of some 27,000 square miles , spanning western Idaho , south-eastern Washington , and north-eastern Oregon .
Large numbers of Shiluk who had fled their southern homeland were working as labourers for Sabaha farmers in the Kosti area .
They did this by adopting the Jamaican music which the black communities in South East London had brought from their homeland and which was the popular music of the Rude Boys .
Even more prisoners , about 60 , are currently being held under equivalent provisions in the nominally independent ` homelands " of the Transkei and Bophuthatswana .

The first ever freckled duck to be born outside Australia has hatched at the Slimbridge Wildfowl and Wetlands trust.The bird is under threat in its drought stricken homeland , so conservationists are delighted about the birth .
As long as we are aliens , we can not forget our true homeland .
The soldiers were from the black homeland of Ciskei .
FROM a stocky little Welsh person visiting her homeland comes news of a train journey from Cardiff yesterday .
The African National Congress condemned the attack which they said was by shadowy forces , intent on encouraging violence in the volatile black Ciskei homeland .

The U.S. Department of Homeland Security was scheduled to break ground Monday at its National Biodefense Analysis and Countermeasures Center .
